Namespaces

Class: BaseFont

component/BaseFont~ BaseFont

new BaseFont(sizeopt, familyopt, coloropt)

This component provides the basic buffering for fonts. All components that extend this should call parse() at some point to proper buffering.
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
size String <optional>
 Font size in pixels
family String <optional>
 Font family name
color String <optional>
 Hexadecimal color
Source:
  • component/BaseFont.js, line 9

Members

(constant) CHARS

String array of characters to be parsed by the component.
Source:
  • component/BaseFont.js, line 39
Example
abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ0123456789çÇáéíóúÁÉÍÓÚàèìòùÀÈÌÒÙäëïöüÄËÏÖÜãõñÃÕÑâêîôûÂÊÎÔÛ_()-,.[]!?@$*%#&{}<>:+-/

Methods

load()

Loads the external font file in memory. When the file is loaded, calls the onLoad function.
Source:
  • component/BaseFont.js, line 50

onLoad()

Callback function, to be triggered when a external font file is loaded into memory.
Source:
  • component/BaseFont.js, line 73

parse()

Parses the font on an array of canvas objects, one for each character, storing them on the internal {Map}. Equivalent to an image buffered on memory.
Source:
  • component/BaseFont.js, line 85

setColor(coloropt)

Set the font color then re-parses for proper buffering
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
color String <optional>
 Hexadecimal color
Source:
  • component/BaseFont.js, line 157

Set the font family then re-parses for proper buffering
Parameters:

 Font family name
